Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by New York (A) in 2013...
Injured on 5/22/2013 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 6/10/2017, off Jhoulys Chacin (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/12/2017, off Mitch Talbot (TOR)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2017, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/28/2018, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2019, hitting .321 with 8 HR, 35 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/1/2019 with a Fractured Hand, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to San Diego on 2/4/2020 (Going to SDN: CF R. Fajardo. Going to NYA: P C. Hubbell Jr., 1B D. Hurst Jr., CF J. Frederick Jr., 3B M. Quintana)...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/14/2021, hitting .417 with 5 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (N), driving in 8 runs on 9/29/2021...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/4/2021, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 2021...
Drove in 9 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 4/20/2022...
Drove in 7 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 5/7/2022...
